name: Potion Panic (Totespare)
description:
Play a cute witch who is defending against creepy ghosts with the help of her two cats in this frantic defense game!

  • Concept art - Lilac, LinaPawz, Lilobelie
  • 3d Models - Duckling, LinaPawz
  • Textures - Duckling, Lilobelie
  • Game Design - Totespare, Lilobelie
  • Programming - Totespare
  • Sounds - Katharina
  • UI Design - Lilac, LinaPawz

Made for the Fem Devs Game Jam 2022!

Added Diversifiers : 

  • Can't Jump, Can't Shoot
  • Friends Fur-ever
  • A capella
  • Spooktacular
